headline: US Fed Reserve Chair Powell opens door to September rate cut
description: Powell’s remarks offered little guidance about how soon or how quickly rates might continue to move lower.

headline: Chip giant Nvidia’s sales rise 56% in boost for AI boom
description: US chipmaker reports revenue of $46.74bn for second quarter, defying fears that AI may be overhyped.

headline: Behind India’s massive Russian oil imports: Asia’s richest man
description: Reliance’s Russian crude imports have soared from 3 percent before the war in Ukraine to 50 percent now.

headline: Canada to ease most retaliatory tariffs against United States
description: Prime Minister Mark Carney says most Canadian goods will be exempted from US tariffs while some sectoral duties remain.

headline: Trump threatens to fire US Fed Governor Lisa Cook
description: Cook, who has been accused of mortgage fraud, says she will not be ‘bullied’ into resigning by the president.

headline: US DOJ to probe Fed Reserve’s Cook, urges Powell to remove her: Report
description: Cook, who has been accused of mortgage fraud, has said she will not be bullied by Trump into resigning.

headline: Walmart scoops customers from rivals but warns inventory cost is rising
description: Second-quarter results showed that the retailer has continued to benefit from price sensitivity among US consumers.
